content.detailedDescription:
The object i observed for 20 minutes was a hovering black dot, which was about 10 degrees above the horizon in the southwest (fresno).  i watched it sitting in my front yard.  my mom couldn't see it, but it was really easy to miss.  while watching, i noticed that the object was indeed moving slightly southwest because it was moving away from me and to the left.  it eventually disappeared after blinking in and out of sight, which could have been happening because it was so far away.

i have seen lots of strange craft in fresno, at least 5 during my years here.
content.summary: Hovering black dot

content.detailedDescription: was outside having a cigarette noticed it was brighter than normal at 9:20pm started looking for source as i looked up it got brighter and brighter noticed a white fireball directly above me shining what i guess to be a spot light/search light  at that very second it appeared to shoot strait up i then could make out the outline of a triangle moving to the northwest at a very slow speed watched it go just passed the tree line before i lost site of it .
content.summary: Fireball with outline of triangle

content.detailedDescription: It was late at night and i was over at my friends house everyone was inside hanging out and such. i stepped outside to get some fresh air since i didn't smoke. when i was outside i noticed an orange light flickering a good distance away, brighter than most of the stars up. i didn't pay it much attention at first because hell looking at the night sky you can see a lot of stars with an orange color to them and they flicker. what caught my attention was when it jolted in a random pattern i got my cell out and started snapping some pictures i managed to get two pics before it was gone. it didn't move to a distance till it was out of sight but, more or less it just vanished after about 5 mins.
content.summary: Orange flickering light moving to random spots.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were outside in are front yard on oct 22 2011 at 930pm.When we saw several lets call them crafts flying directly above us. the best way to describe it is looked like a fleet of triangular ships that were different sizes.They were heading in a straight line east to west.5 or 6 small 4 or 5 medium and one massive triangle (the mothership)was at the end of the convoy.The smaller craft were flying like geese heading south at fist,but then they broke off in different directions fast then they formed a tight triangle.They did this a couple times. always heading due west.The med triangles followed then the big one behind them.My feelings at the time were stay focused and remember.I lost site when they reached lake michigan shoreline then they just seemed to fade away.There was not a cloud in the sky that night.We saw them clearly....
content.summary: 4 different sizes about 12 crafts

content.detailedDescription:
Three of us where standing out in the backyard at 10pm watching the sky for shooting stars. i looked up and saw what looked to be 3 points of light forming a perfect triangle in the sky about 50 degrees up from the horizon. the object was moving very fast, i yelled to the other two people by me to look and they also locked into it right away. as i first saw the object i stayed locked onto it and never took my eyes off it. out of my peripheral vision i noticed a 2nd object dip down in the sky and then back up, it then followed the triangle formation on the exact line of flight in the sky. the 2nd object was only one light and about the same brightness as the triangle formation. it trailed the triangle by about 2 hand widths if you held your had out at arms length.

the triangle consisted of a point of light in the front and flanked on each side by one light. the brightness of these objects was pretty much equal to your average star in the sky. i have witnessed and track satellites with computer software and have also seen the navys noss satellites pass over before and this was not that. size of the triangle was equal in width to a penny held out at arms length. i know how fast satellites travel when the pass over and this was these objects were traveling 3 to 4 times that fast if not even faster. they covered about 35 percent of the sky in roughly 5 seconds or less. the sky was clear except for a one small cloud. the objects passed above this cloud and then faded out and we lost visual on them. also as the triangle formation went across the sky in between the 3 points of light there was kind of a shimmer of very dull light for a brief second. no shape could be observed and as the object traveled through the sky it didn't pass in front of bright stars so i can't say if it would visually blocked out the star or if it would seemed transparent. that remains unknown. there was absolutely no sound from either objects even after they had passed from sight. we live in a small town out in the desert and its dead silent out here if was a jet of some sort we would have heard it. we also live in close proximity to the barry goldwater bombing range so we see our share of military jets pass over but they do not fly as fast as these objects where traveling. i have no idea if this something traveling in our atmosphere or if it was in space. normal orbit speed in space is roughly 17,500mph and as i said this was 3 to 4 times as fast as that. if it was something in the atmosphere i would have to estimate the speed in excess of 2000mph, there was no sonic boom either.

i consider myself a amateur astronomer and i am also heavy into civilian and military  aviation photography. this was nothing like i have seen before. if i had to guess i would say it was some sort of military object that isn't known about yet? all 3 of us where at a loss for words as to what this could have been. i would really like to know if anyone else beside us saw this that night? all 3 of us were glued to the sky for another 1/2hr as we were amazed by this. nothing more was seen that night.
content.summary: Triangular formation of lights with a single light trailing behind

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in my lawn chair in my back yard this past friday in west hills california 10-22-11 sky watching and at approximately 1:30 am as i looked west i saw a black triangle shape craft glide through the air very fast in about a 500 foot window from tree to tree before it went out of view,the craft was at an altitude of about 500-1000 feet(it was very close),the craft was traveling north to south,at about the middle of the 5 second window of view i had, the craft banked sharply 45" and i saw its underside completely,it had 3 very dim lights shining at all 3 triangle points,there were no other lights that i could see.The craft made no noise and i clearly saw the shape and form of it as it was very starry out,there was a sliver moon and the sky was completely cloudless also it was eerily quiet and you could have heard a pin drop..At the close range sighting of this craft i should have been able to have heard some type of engine if it indeed was military.. the appearance of the craft seemed almost as if it was holographic,the lights were very dim on this craft almost as if being seen through cloud cover which there was not..I did not see this craft again or any other for the remainder of the early morning into next day.The size of the craft from as much as i can judge in the time i saw it was between 30- 50 feet wide....
content.summary: Sitting in back yard at 2 am looked left and saw the cratft at about 1,000 feet for 5 seconds between trees

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home down creve coeur mill rd past creve coeur lake  when something shiny came into view up in the sky.  it was hovering in the sky, it didn't fly by me. i think i had about a 2-3 minute view as i was driving before the trees blocked my view.  it was at around a 67 degree angle on the horizon.

as i was driving i kept watching the thing and i thought it must be a dad out with his kid flying a big saucer-shaped inflatable somewhere in the park around the lake. but, the shiny thing did not move or waver or flutter in the wind, and it was pretty big. i'm not a good judge of size or distance.  since it didn't move i then thought it must be a blimp. it was extremely reflective silver-colored and as i drove closer i could see the outline more clearly.  it was definitely saucer shaped, light and reflective on top and dark on the bottom, like two saucers stuck together. the reflection off of the thing seemed to have a pattern, as if it was constructed in panels
i wanted to pull over, but the road didn't have a good place to pull off, and i figured that once i got around the trees i'd get to a place to pull over and get a better look.  

all of this was processing through my brain as i was driving and watching the thing in the sky.    it was becoming clear to me that i wasn't looking at a blimp.  i am very familiar with the road, so it wasn't hard to look up and watch the road at the same time.  i watched the on coming traffic and people walking the path around the lake to see if anyone else was looking up and nobody was. the trees at the other end of the lake were coming up so i knew that they would block my view for a few seconds until i could find a place to pull over.  but, when i got around the trees, it was gone. 

i don't think the object was right above the lake, or the trees, i think it was off in the distance and it must have been pretty big.  i am not a good judge of distance or size when something is far away, but it appeared to be smaller than a "goodyear blimp" but much bigger than a car or truck.  the day was very bright and hardly any clouds around, the object was below the clouds.  it didn't seem to be a reflection or visual trick, the shape was too distinct and clear.  there were some large power lines around, but there weren't any tall towers or buildings nearby that could have reflected light.

the area that i was driving was south on creve coeur mill rd going past the lake.  anyone at the lake that afternoon would have seen it if they looked to the southern horizon of the lake above the tree line.  the object appeared to hover above a wooded residential area near the lake, on the north side of olive/clarkson, near where the 141 construction is going on. from the air, the object would have had a view of the missouri river bottom on one side and hwy 40-141 on the other side. the area is near a lot of large power lines and not far from the chesterfield airport.

i would love to know if anyone else in the area reported seeing what i saw!
content.summary: Disc shape object sited near creve coeur lake

content.detailedDescription: Driving along back road in nc very dark outside felt pulsating presence and saw object hovering over forest line.  large swamp and forest, no houses near there.  felt our bodies heat up and i asked my partner how he felt and he said i knew you were going to ask that.  received communication that it was a plaedian ship and felt very happy. our car was then hit by a giant meaty dragon fly the size of a closed fist.
content.summary: Back road nc dark ufo warped reality!

content.detailedDescription: Reported this back in 2009 to mufon was told was high profile catagory 2 case with entity involved did not get to talk with field investigator before i moved so i am going to put them on again on feb 5th 2009 aprox. 8pm i was staying in austn texas close to lake travis for work while waiting for a tv show i went outside while outside i looked up there was a huge brite lite the size of the moon just feet from the ground so brite i could not focus on it my first reaction was to go inside to get my cell phone to snap pictures i stood to the side of the building i was staying and took one picture holding phone almost straight up keeping phone on object did not move on my screen so i went back to where i was at first took another picture with phone almost straight up again there was a smaller pulsating light coming towards me from the bottom it had a strobing like pattern at this time i became extremly afraid that somthing was not right my first reaction was to go back inside i sat my phone down and sat down in a chair the next thing i remember it was 5hrs. later i woke up on the foor laying on my side my eyes were burning and i was soaking wet all over the front of my body i put ice on my eyes and went back to sleep the next morning i woke to go to work and relized then what had happened got up to check to see if my pictures had came out after checking them and showing my friends they said i should contact mufon which i did and moved before i got any feedback from the investigator so here they are again for those who did not see em before
content.summary: Saw moon sized light with pulsating light coming from it took pictures on my cell phone revealing awsome detail with entity

content.detailedDescription:
I was photographing a sun halo over denmark in odense city back in october 9th 2009 at 1.37 pm. around 1.30 pm. i looked out my window in a westerly direction, looked up to the left and saw a halo around the sun. since it was first time i had the opportunity to photograph a sun halo with my new bought camera, i hurried down to our back yard, put the camera on tripod and took 8 pictures with short intervals.

i was alone and didn���������t see anything while i was photographing. i was quickly blinded by the sun and my photosession was quickly settled. a faintly luminous object, that easily could fell in with the background, had in any case been difficult to discern. it was only later when i looked through the images, that i discovered this unidentified flying object, which only appeared on one of the images.

in the picture, the object appears more cylindrical than cigar-shaped, with distinct curves at each end. the rise in the middle seems to be a kind of flash of light. for me it seems to be a real physical object in 3d.

basic observation data:
*denmark, odense, october 9, 2009 at 1.37.12 pm
*camera position: 55 24'16.82" n - 10 22'18.93" e
*compass direction: south
*camera: sony a100 (reflex) / sony standard lens 3.5-5.6 / 18-70 (on tripod)

my background:
i am 42 years old and live in denmark, odense. i am amateur photographer and former business manager.

i encourages you to see the rest of the ufo pictures on my blog: 

[link moved to field investigator section/cms/tg]
content.summary: I was photographing a sun halo and caught a cigar-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Sat. oct 22,2011 @10:45pm to 11:40 noticed slow fire orange object/light moving west to east it went out,dissapeared, no sound at all, then another and another ,6 seperate identical objects same path and several minutes apart all no sounds,all seperate objects went out at same place in sky and disapeared from sight.These light objects were low,maybe 500ft above tree level.Very intense orange color.Realy stuck out in the night sky.I videoed,these objects,but shaky me,nowhere to stabalize camera.I was on my front porch ,faces north,when i first saw the light i thought what the!I remember thinking here we go again,i ve seen strange sightings before right here before usually in the west to east movement.
on one occasion i got two creatures on my trailcam not of this world im telling you!
content.summary: 6 fire orange object/lights going west to east

content.detailedDescription:
Was leaving a residence at about 2230 hours in riddle.  the sky had been clear and stars were clearly visible.  as i got into the car, i saw a large white strobe light brightly blink on the horizon behind some trees, although i found it curious and watched the sky for several minutes, i passed it off as perhaps a small plane flying over the mountains.

about five minutes later, as i was driving east on the riddle by-pass road towards the 103 exit of interstate 5, we saw the same type of white light randomly blinking over another mountain top.  these mountains are to the northwest of the i-5 103 exit.  i estimated the lights were just over the mountain tops and about four or five miles away from where we were.  you could intermittently see the reflection of some of the brighter flashes across the back of the mountain.

we could see the lights start flashing in various random patterns at this point.  there appeared to be one main light (about aspirin size) that would flash intermittently.  it would disappear and then there would be a series of eight to ten small lights that would flash into a vertical pattern, and then into a horizontal pattern.  the length of these patterns seems to vary.  

i eventually pulled over into an empty parking lot where me and my family got out to watch.  the light patterns continued on this pattern for several more minutes.  it was then i noticed the lights were also flashing into a triangular shape.

each transformation into these shapes lasted only for a few seconds.  at one point, when the lights extended into a vertical line, there appeared to be several small satellite lights that fell from the top of the vertical line.  these lights appears as if they must have hit the mountain top or they just seemed to vanish.  it was too dark to see any sort of hard structure or shape, other than what shape the lights made.  the lights also extended into a curved vertical line (like a half moon shape).  the horizontal and vertical patterns seemed to stretch over the greatest distance over the mountain; using about eight to twelve individual lights.

we watched these lights for about twenty to thirty minutes.  we continued north on the freeway and could still see the lights from mile post #108.  i pulled over again to view the lights from a different angle.  the lights (although slightly dimmer due to the distance and haze now beginning to form in the air) were still blinking in the same manner.  the lights were all white in color, although a few of the smaller falling lights almost appeared to have an orange and blue hue sometimes.

the last i saw of the lights had been when a solid light (not blinking as all the others had been) dropped from the top of the vertical line to the ground.  the lights seemed to disappear from view at that point.

there are some large radio towers several miles to the north along this same mountain top.  all the radio towers have solid red and a few blinking red lights on them.  

having grown up in the area, i have no explanation for what we saw at this point.  my son and i were able to take several videos on our iphone 3gs.  due to the distance, darkness and video quality, they didn't turn out great.  however, the footage may be able to be lightened.
content.summary: Observed multiple lights randomly blinking into various shapes over a mountain top.

content.detailedDescription:
I deliver auto parts to customers in the kawartha lakes area in ontario each weekly night. my normal route takes me into cottage country which is very remote in places. on early saturday morning oct 15th 2011 at approx 03.00hrs i was driving east north east along hwy 7/12 between the villages of manilla and oakwood heading for the town of lindsay. the sky was clear with a full moon a few clouds to the west of my position. i observed to my front left (north east) white lights moving towards me (south west).

i assumed it was an aircraft heading for pearson int airport due to it's low altitude 3-5 thousand feet, however it struck me there were no red and green navigation lights showing and it appeared it's landing lights were on. i wanted to observe the aircraft properly so i pulled my truck over onto the soft shoulder and climbed out of my cab onto the fuel tank step. from my position i watched the aircraft approach me and noticed red flashing light from below the landing lights.

the aircraft came closer and changed direction from south west to west south west, at this moment i observed what i thought to be landing lights were actually lights from under the aircraft. the aircraft passed me at approx 70 degree angle just north of me. this allowed me to observe there were four white lights under the aircraft, one at the front and rear and one at each wing tip ( i assumed these were where they were located) two flashing red lights were located under the aircraft together in it's center. as it passed i remarked to myself it's a perfect diamond. even though it was a full moon and the sky was clear with stars i was unable to observe the aircraft's shape or hear any engine sounds. no other lights were seen. no strobes or cabin lights which i see from other aircraft. 

the aircraft remained on it's west south west course until it entered the cloud formation to my west. as it did so the clouds lit up dull white and dimmed as it passed through them. i climbed back into my cab and carried on with my route.

the only reason i send this email is because what i observed was unusual. no marker navigation lights, strobes or normal recognition lights. i assumed it was a military aircraft or commercial aircraft that had lost lighting control. living near person int airport i'm in constant sight of commercial aircraft operating at night. this aircraft was vastly different from those i normally observe.
thanks.
content.summary: Large aircraft without normal flight lights

content.detailedDescription:
Saw about 8-10 lights moving in south easterly direction at 8 pm saturday, october 22, 1011 in the area bounded by haverford ave-remington rd powdermil and monoa rds. 

took @ 1 minute of phone video cam of two of the lights remaining stationery over my head off about 15 degrees.
content.summary: Saw about 8-10 lights moving in south easterly direction at 8 pm saturday, october 22, 1011 in the area bounded by haverford ave-remington rd powdermil and monoa rds.

content.detailedDescription: Bright large orb traveling quickly from nw to se stopping then seemed to ascend out of sight. it was way brighter then jupiter on its brightest clearest night! white/yellow/blue mix and pulsation. in the area of sight for about 5 minutes. tried taking a video of it and it did not show up on view finder. other lights as street lamps and airplanes in the other area did show up.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large pulsating orb traveling quickly across the sky from north west to south east. stopped the seemed to ascend.

content.detailedDescription: Walking to the gas station with a friend around 11pm . my friend brought the object to my attention , i first thought geese flying in a v formation but as i watched , it was clear it was not geese . we watched the object we heard no noise it appeared to be moving slow the clouds were fairly low the object was moving in a strait direction , the triangle had approx 7 dull circles under it . i am not sure of the circles purpose . i was speechless . my friends first responce was alien , i disagreed . i dont know what i saw but i did see somthing . i lost focus as the object continued thru the clouds and darkness .
content.summary: Triangle with dull circles under it no noise , aprox 7 circles .

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside having a smoke and looking at the stars as i usually do.
i wanted to see the constellation of orion so i had to sit on our balcony railing.

i was looking up as in straight up and then i noticed it. i first thought that it could be a plane but it was moving very fast and had no faa lights on it and if it was a plane it was flying faster then any i'd seen at what i would assume was a very high altitude. it was moving very quickly much like you'd see a bird at about 75' over head. 

i 1st noticed the 4 red/orange lights and though it funny that i couldn't see the faa lights, and then i noticed the speed it was traveling and the spacing of the lights was all wrong for a plane. and that's when it clicked in my head that there was something very odd about this.

there were red-orange, more red then orange... and not that faa red, this was a dull red, another thing that caught my attention, the color of the lights. 4 lights, no tail lights no faa. just 4 lights traveling very quickly at what i would assume was a very high altitude towards the 2 bottom stars of the orion constellation, for about 6-7 seconds when it faded out and i couldn't see the object / objects anymore.
i don't know if these 4 lights were part of a larger object or 4 separate objects. 

i think that covers everything. 

holy crap...
i feel lucky to have seen this. i don't know how to put this in to words, but i've seen space junk, the iss, multi-stage rockets and stealth planes etc etc etc. this was something that i've never ever seen before and i am my own harshest skeptic.
content.summary: 4 lights in a row traveling north to south, faint but moving very fast

content.detailedDescription:
1. 2 honors college students were stargazing atop tallest building on college campus.  (no intoxicants were involved)

2. after about 30 minutes of stargazing and satellite-watching, i pointed out an especially bright "satellite" (or so i thought... it was 4-8x brighter than venus) moving at "average" satellite speed, traveling horizontally from north to south.  

after viewing the object for about 15 seconds, it made a slow s curve in the sky, then suddenly accelerated, and flew across 60% of the night sky, disappearing over the horizon, in < 3 seconds!  the object was very high in the air, and the light it emitted was steady and white.  like i said, it could have been mistaken for a very bright satellite if it had not rocketed over the horizon in mere seconds!  

my stargazing buddy and i were startled, but unaffected by this event.  we have not told anyone for fear of being thought "crazy."  

i have since seen this exact type of phenomenon 2 more times from the roof of the same building, though i did not document the dates.  (the view of the sky is unobstructed, and we are not in the flight path of an airport.)


the flight path of the object looked roughly like this:

=== is slow speed, ----- is extreme speed, < indicates direction.

<---------------------------------==~==============<
content.summary: Satellite-like object traveled slowly, then flew horizontally across 60% of night sky in < 3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: Enjoying the nice evening and with much aircraft traffic from oakland int'l and sfo both private and mostly commercial this light caught my eye and i tried to follow it.Time was approx 10:30 pm with clear skies. it at first i thought was a commercial ac heading west but then it moved erratically and not so much in a straight line but up,down,right,left,and extremely fast.Hard to reference distances at night but movements were fast, slow, just not normal. the light or lights(i could'nt determine if one or more) did not blink as all a/c do normally and were not,i repeat not,port and starboard red and green or landing lights but what appeared to be just one white light.The movements were very distinct and at times hard to track as the light was not a constant. i tried to follow it and did so until the light went below neighbors roof-line but the movements were extremely erratic. i assumed based on my own knowledge and experience flying that i thought it to be at normal heights of commercial traffic not in the landing or take-off patterns here in the sf/bay area. i thought it (?) to be at 20 to 30 k ft alt but who knows.
content.summary: Rapid erratic movement from se to sw with sporadic lights appearing to blink on then off(no constant)

content.detailedDescription: I had pulled into the driveway... and looked up and saw this bright pulsating "star" the "star" like object was pulsating with what looked like some sort of aura around it .. it ws headed to the right and went behind some trees.. then it came back not pulsating at all but with a steady glow ,very very bright..No blinking lights! went right and traveled for a good distance and then just vanished! i was very exicted about this and told my father to look because i had tried to get him to see one because i see them quite often he hurried out of his truck and looked up. he made no excuses for it and didn't even try to come up with a possible explanation of what it could be. i do believe that he believes in ufo's now. ever sense this he looks up a lot more!
content.summary: The

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when i saw a bright object moving slowly through the sky from the east. because of the orange-red glow it was emitting, i was concerned it was an airplane that had caught on fire. i ran outside to watch it to see if it was losing elevation and was going to plummet to the ground. it's movement was slower than a plane and there was no noise. when i first saw it, it was heading from east to west. it suddenly took a 90 degree turn and started heading due north. it abruptly stopped and hovered for a couple of minutes. i was so excited, i ran into the house and upstairs to summon my husband to see it. he looked out the back window and saw it too. then, it disappeared from sight in a the blink of an eye.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Not close enough to see the object, only lots of lights that looked like it was on fire.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home to joliet on i-355 from chicagoabout a mile from the ramp for i-55 south i noticed a red light up ahead that i thought may be on a tower but as i got closer it appeared to hover right over the expressway and as i passed it i had to hang my head out the window to look up and get a better look but all i saw was a bright red light like that of a laser. i was going to turn around and hope it was still there to get a picture but while driving south down i-55 i noticed three star like craft in a triagle formation. i continued to drive and exited the bolingbrook ramp in hopes to find a quiet area to take pictures but there was too much traffic in the area and no place to really situate myself so i got back onto i-55 and i noticed now there were only two in a side by side formation and the 3rd one traveled somewhat south of the other two. i continued to drive and got off the weber road exit. i drove about 1/2 mile and pulled into a subdivision and noticed some people standing on the corner so i figured i would find another spot to take pictures. i pulled out of the subdivision and back onto weber road i quickly saw a mini mall to the right north of airport rd and pulled into the back of the lot but right before i turned for a split second i saw what resembled a falling star but then i thought no it can't be so the next thing i can compare it to is when a firework hot ash comes down from the sky but goes out before touching the ground. this happened only about 20 feet in front of my vehicle, very strange. so i pulled behind a minni mall and then starts the light show. the craft turns blue purple red blue purple red and starts to move forward toward me then i see another craft decend and then raising up and then back down behind another subdivision across airport road which would be south of where i was. i headed out south out of the parking lot west down airport road then south turning into the subdivision all while watching this color show. when i pulled into the subdivision on ritchfield trail activity seemed to stop i made a right down fiddyment drive and when i peered between two houses i seen the craft raise up just enough that i was able to see something in the shape of a lopsided v there was a blue arm and a shorter red arm, but as fast as i saw it it was gone. the next thing i notice is a diamond shaped craft flying overhead west to east. i  down ritchfield trail south back behind the subdision to see if i could see anything but i got scared and turned back. there seemed to be several of these craft in the area. i also have pictures and i recorded some of it on my phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed several craft of two different types in the romeoville area

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to walk my dog before bed.  i live in the outskirts of town on lake valhalla.  as soon as i walked to the road no more than 75 feet from my house i looked up to the sky and noticed 2 red lights over the left of my lake.  it was exceptionally quiet tonite and found it odd looking to see if it was a helicopter or plane, and upon finding a better spot to look, noticed that it had not moved and that it was big, with 3 red lights in the shape of a elongated triangle/chevron.  

there is a small airport near the end of our lake, but this craft made absolutely no noise and hoovered in the same spot for 12 minutes before simply dissapearing.  it kinda shifted where i saw only 2 lights before that, but my dog was spooked and very still for this whole time.  he would not bark or move from my side which is very unusual.  the woods were quiet too, except for the sound of the lake overflow pipe. it is a clear night with not too much cloud coverage. its point was heading west in full view before it shifted north and dissapeared in an instant.  there one minute, gone the next with no noise whatsoever. the woods, incredibly still and my dog would not do his business and wanted to come home like he was in a trance.

this is my first ufo siting in pennsylvania, and we are only 2 miles from town.  the red lights were very noticeable on the horizon just over the trees. there is no other explaination for this except that it was not of this world.  the lights were a constant red glow and you could faintly see the outline of a large mass in the sky over the far end of the lake above the treeline but not close to the ground.  about the height of helicopters, flight path, of which i see often. our community is large but spread out.  this was earie to say the least because i am frequently outside with the dog in the middle of he night at times on our very dark, very woody lane.  

i feel very numb and concerned now, because although i believe intelligent life exist beyond our universe, this is home - a place near people and yet very quiet and peaceful. don't want to be scared, but i am for both my 75 year old mom and myself.  ufo's don't make appearances close to towns, but it did.  wondering if other saw it too?  

this is the second unusual anomily i witnessed in the past 3 months.  in august my son and i witnessed a red thunderstorm and lightning which hit the same spot for over an hour.  the sky was red over the same area as this siting, and many others noticed it too as we followed it through town to the edge of the pa/nj boarder only 4 miles from our home. 

if anyone else has seen this aircraft, please report as this is calmly freaking me out.
content.summary: Mithree red lignts prominent large over tree line, hovered for 5-10 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my evening job about 11:30pm on 10-19-11.  i turned into pocoshock dr. from hull street road and about 100 ft after turning in, suddenly everything illuminated with a blueish white light that continued for what seemed about 3 seconds. it was almost as if a light switch had been turned on.  i could not see or figure out what was causing such a bright light. there are mature trees on either side of the road so it was difficult to see a large enough portion of the sky.  my thoughts were, "are we being attacked?  is this an explosion?"  i braced for a bang but then the night blackness resumed--followed quickly by a flash over the tree tops to my right and then whatever the source it was gone. i did not see any indication of a ufo craft--just the amazingly bright light that i described. i immediately rolled down my windows to listen for thunder--but there was nothing but silence.  
  
i thought at the time that surely lightening that bright and low as to illuminate such a huge area would cause a big bang--but again there was nothing but silence.  there were no other cars traveling on the street that could have been shining bright haligen headlights at me. i pulled over on dell drive on the surreywood subdivision side where i could safely stop and i looked out the car window for signs of storm clouds or for a search helicopter--but neither existed.  the sky was silent and filled with wispy clouds--but no storm clouds that i could see.

i was very puzzled, but surprisingly calm.  the odd light had been so bright that my eyes slightly ached at the back of my eye balls--but strangely i did not see spots in front of my eyes as would be typical when a bright light was shined in your face. this was definitely a very unique occurrence and has kept me thinking about it and researching similar reports on the internet. i have shared the experience with my family and co-workers--who have listened kindly and considered the event odd as well.
content.summary: I was driving and all of sudden all was lit by blue/white light -then flash above tree line and then gone. no storms or search helicopter seen.

content.detailedDescription:
It was years ago, i was coming home from work at about 9:20 pm. as i was approaching church road heading south on ferndale avenue, i noticed in the sky to my left, about 60 degrees up from the horizon, and about 70 degrees to the left of directly in front of me, two lights that looked like car headlights off in the distant sky. i was amused that it looked like the headlights of the flying car in the movie "flubber" by walt disney. it held my attention for a second or two as i drove down the straight street and didn't need to watch the road closely.

as i approached church road, the light on the left came swooping downward in front of me. it went from the size of a bb to about the size of a green pea and made a downward arc passing about 40 to 50 feet in front of my car and with the lowest point of the arc being about 25 to 30 degrees above horizontal to me. it moved in a symmetrical arc back up into the sky and was gone in an instant.

i looked back to see what the other light might have done. it was now about the size of a nickel and was about 45 degrees above the horizon and about 45 degrees to the left of directly in front of me, approaching about as slowly as a private airplane. in seconds, the one brighter light became more discernible as four separate lights.

the object seemed to have no outline as it moved overhead, and i could see that the lights were two circular white lights and two diamond-shaped white lights. they were arranged with the two diamond-shaped ones on the right and left and the two circular ones in the front and rear.

as the object got closer, it was so large i wanted to get a better look at it, so i pulled my car across church road and got out to see better. i don't know why i got out. i was not the least bit afraid. i just wanted to see it. it was now directly overhead. i couldn't see an outline at all but was sure it was one object and if round, would have been about the size of a softball held at arm's length.

it moved slowly and silently across the sky above me and off to my right. although it was moving approximately the direction that church road went, i did not jump in my car and attempt to follow it, and have no idea why i didn't. it slowly floated toward the horizon and i just got in my car and headed home, feeling so lucky that i had finally seen an object that was flying and unidentified.

due to the facts that i was not afraid, that i got out of my car, and that i didn't try to follow it, i have often wondered if it made me feel those feelings. i would really like to undergo regressive hypnosis to find out if i was taken and returned, or was entranced, and i would like to be made to recall more details and the date of this experience.

if this is possible, please contact me.
content.summary: Small object passed quickly followed by larger object floating slowly over me.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside talking with my neighbor when i saw a bright blue light shoot downwards at a 45 degree angle and out of sight behind some tree. i know it was not a shooting star i have seen plenty of those in my life to know it wasn't besides it was clear outside. i can't explain it other than it was the definition of u.F.O!
content.summary: Fast bright blue light

content.detailedDescription:
First sorry about my english (i'm french). at the day of 26 of june 2011 about 1h00 passing 06/25/2011 during 10s i made an ufo observation about a dark and silent boomerang above paris buildings. 

laing down in the grass and about watching the sky, i was observing stars and constellations hence satellite objects because the sky like the atmosphere were very good and clear that day. i started around 11pm and spend about 1hour in what way. then approaching midnight i decided to leave cause i'm leaving far from that place when once again i turned my head to look again the sky. 
then i was astonish to see something like starlight moving together in the same direction. i knew that this couldn't be possible so immediately i realized that those lights were surrounded by an other light what gave to the object a boomerang shape. 
the object had 4 no blinking lights in one side and 2 no blink lights in other second side/
it was move from north east side to the south west side when we refer to the map of france.
all inner light of the object was dark and looked transparent because the color was the same as the sky. 
there was no sound, no noise from the object and it was look close and much more bigger than a simple aircraft.
compare to the planes i could observe meanwhile those one who use to be very hight in the sky were in the same size to the light i could see in the sides of the wings boomerang. i was like i could observe 6 airplanes waving same time and in the same direction in the middle of the night or this happened in the center of paris city, with city lights.
after 10s of observation when trying to take my cellphone to shoot the scene the object disappear completely. 
even a lot of people where around to me i was so chocked that i could yell or talk. 
then i called the police to leave a testimony when talking to theme, they advice me to pass and make a deposit i said yes but never gone before.
content.summary: Boomrang shape starlite straight direction no sound no noise transparent paris france june 2011 dark black

content.detailedDescription: At 7:30pm est. i was standind outside in front of my door looking at the evening sky & star's when i witnessed an "object" cross the sky at an extremely high rate of speed from the north west---heading to the south east.  before it went out of site it made a 180 degree u-turn & came back at me for about 3 to 4 sec's then disappeared/evaporated!  i am a former (f.A.A.) employee, & this is the very first "object" i have ever seen after all the years i have been looking at the skies.  the altitude was approximated at between 30,000 & 50,000 ft.  it was hard to tell at the speed it was traveling at.  (my front door face's due east.)  mike.
content.summary: I am a retired employee of the (f.A.A.), & have much knowledge of usual aircraft's altitude & speed.  of all my year's of looking up at the skies, this is the very first time i,ve ever seen anything like this.

content.detailedDescription: My girl was siting in the chair smoking a cigerett and observed it out the window. i watched it thinking it was a plane cause of the colors. after 10 min i noticed it did not move , so i went to the store and bought binoculars and came back and it was still there i could see it more clear and it look like it was way up in the stratosphere and had to be real big for me to see it .......
content.summary: It was like watching a christmas tree blinking and it was stationary a long time its still there..Ne sky low in the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from my house to the bus stop around 6:45 in the morning, and i was with my brother. i looked up because i had this gut feeling. when i looked up, i saw this giant bright orb, hovering above me, and i stare it it, and then it shoots away so fast, i can barely understand what just happened. it was a really bright orb. my step-dad is a huge believer of ufo's and aliens, and he has had a couple of experiences with them, and so i am also a total believer as well. but as soon as i saw that, i freaked out and got really excited, and told my brother, and he doesn't believe me but whatever. i told almost all the people at my bus stop, and they thought i was just messing, but i wasn't... and i lost sight of the object because it shot across the sky, and disappeared.
content.summary: I was walking to the bus stop, and i looked up and saw this giant bright orb hovering, and then it shoots across the sky.
